code: class  Solution  {   public :   vector < vector < string >>  findDuplicate ( vector < string >&  paths )  {   vector < vector < string >>  ans ;   unordered_map < string ,  vector < string >>  contentToFilePaths ;   for  ( const  string &  path  :  paths )  {   istringstream  iss ( path );   string  rootPath ;   iss  >>  rootPath ;    string  fileAndContent ;   while  ( iss  >>  fileAndContent )  {    const  int  l  =  fileAndContent . find ( '(' );   const  int  r  =  fileAndContent . find ( ')' );     const  string  file  =  fileAndContent . substr ( 0 ,  l );     const  string  content  =  fileAndContent . substr ( l  +  1 ,  r  -  l  -  1 );     const  string  filePath  =  rootPath  +  '/'  +  file ;   contentToFilePaths [ content ]. push_back ( filePath );   }   }   for  ( const  auto &  [ _ ,  filePaths ]  :  contentToFilePaths )   if  ( filePaths . size ()  >  1 )   ans . push_back ( filePaths );   return  ans ;   }  };
